title: INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION_AND_PAUSE
content:
0x8A694D7A68F8DC380xDD4A3F1F// InterruptConversationAndPause
void INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION_AND_PAUSE(Ped interrupterPed, char* context, char* voiceName);Parameters:interrupterPed: the ped speakingcontext: the line to usevoiceName: the voicename for the audio assetHandles conversation interrupts and pauses, using the code-side system for improved timing and to minimize unfriendly logic interactions.
codeBlocks:
// InterruptConversationAndPause
void INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION_AND_PAUSE(Ped interrupterPed, char* context, char* voiceName);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for INTERRUPT_CONVERSATION_AND_PAUSE
InterruptConversationAndPause(ped, 'example', 'example')
